name: root
description: Proxify your npm package for easier imports

scripts.proxify: yarn build && yarn workspace foo run proxify
scripts.empty: yarn build && yarn workspace foo run proxify:empty
scripts.error: yarn build && yarn workspace foo run proxify:error
scripts.help: yarn build && yarn workspace foo run proxify:help
scripts.clean: yarn build && yarn workspace foo run proxify:clean
scripts.ci: yarn build && yarn workspace package-proxy test:ci
